article.name: How can nginx copyright be acknowledged when using nginx as part of a proprietary software distibution?

section.para: Q: I'd like to use nginx distribution as part of my proprietary software package. How can nginx copyright be acknowledged when using nginx as part of a proprietary software distibution?

A: The section of text below should be added to your license descriptions. Also, if your build of nginx includes any of the following 3rd party products: zlib, PCRE, OpenSSL — it's worth including their copyright acknowledgements and disclaimers as well.
